author: Karl Rock
description: I tried “butter chicken” in England and… wow. Creamy tomato soup sauce, chewy chicken, cumin-seed naan - this is the dish that tricked me into flying to India to taste the REAL thing. 🇮🇳🔥 I roast it, but to be fair… this was the gateway drug that started my whole journey across India. If you’ve only tried the Western version, you haven’t tasted Indian food yet. Real butter chicken hits VERY different. Are you ready to upgrade?
title: The Truth About Chicken Tikka Masala
